whyChooseUs.title: What You'll Find in Relevi

hero.title: Our Services
hero.subtitle: Awaken your vital energy: explore our therapeutic paths.

packages.title: Start your wellness journey
packages.subtitle: Contact us today for a personalized consultation and discover how we can help you find harmony between body and mind.

cta.title: Ready to Book Your Service?
cta.subtitle: Contact us today to schedule your appointment and take the first step toward wellness and relaxation.

swedishMassage.title: Swedish Massage
swedishMassage.description: A gentle, relaxing massage that uses long strokes and kneading to promote relaxation.
swedishMassage.fullDescription: Swedish Massage is one of the most popular massage techniques. It uses long gliding strokes, circular movements, kneading, and tapping to ease muscle tension and promote relaxation. Perfect for first-time clients and those seeking general wellness.

deepTissue.title: Deep Tissue
deepTissue.description: Targeted pressure on chronic tension areas to release deep-seated knots.
deepTissue.fullDescription: Deep tissue massage uses slow, deliberate strokes and concentrated pressure on muscle layers to release chronic tension. This treatment is ideal for those with muscle knots, chronic pain, or high stress levels.

hotStoneTherapy.title: Hot Stone Therapy
hotStoneTherapy.description: Heated basalt stones placed on key points to melt away tension and promote deep relaxation.
hotStoneTherapy.fullDescription: Hot stone therapy combines massage with the therapeutic benefits of heated stones. The warmth penetrates deep into muscles, promoting relaxation and healing. Ideal for winter months and stress relief.

aromatherapy.title: Aromatherapy
aromatherapy.description: Essential oils combined with massage techniques to enhance physical and emotional well-being.
aromatherapy.fullDescription: Aromatherapy harnesses the power of essential oils to enhance the massage experience. Each oil has unique therapeutic properties, from lavender for relaxation to eucalyptus for invigoration.

sportsMassage.title: Sports Massage
sportsMassage.description: Specialized techniques to help athletes prepare for events and recover from training.
sportsMassage.fullDescription: Sports massage is designed specifically for athletes and active individuals. It helps prevent injuries, improves performance, and accelerates recovery from training and competition.

reflexology.title: Reflexology
reflexology.description: Pressure applied to specific points on the feet and hands to promote overall wellness.
reflexology.fullDescription: Reflexology is based on the principle that specific points on the feet and hands correspond to different organs and systems in the body. Stimulating these points promotes healing and balance throughout the body.

prenatalMassage.title: Prenatal Massage
prenatalMassage.description: Specialized massage designed for pregnant women to reduce discomfort and promote wellness.
prenatalMassage.fullDescription: Our prenatal massage is specifically designed for expecting mothers. Using safe techniques and specialized positioning, we help relieve back pain, reduce swelling, and prepare your body for labor.

couplesMassage.title: Couples Massage
couplesMassage.description: Share a relaxing massage experience with someone special in our dedicated couples room.
couplesMassage.fullDescription: Enjoy a synchronized massage experience in our luxurious couples massage room. Perfect for anniversaries, special occasions, or simply quality time together with a loved one.

naturopathicConsultation.title: Naturopathic Consultation
naturopathicConsultation.description: Comprehensive natural health guidance tailored to your unique wellness needs.
naturopathicConsultation.fullDescription: Our naturopathic consultations combine traditional healing wisdom with modern wellness practices. We assess your overall health and create personalized treatment plans using natural remedies and holistic approaches to support your well-being.

holisticMassages.title: Holistic Massages
holisticMassages.description: Integrated massage therapy combining various techniques for complete body and mind wellness.
holisticMassages.fullDescription: Our holistic massage approach integrates multiple therapeutic techniques to address your complete well-being. By combining different massage styles and healing modalities, we create a comprehensive treatment that balances body, mind, and spirit.

iridology.title: Iridology
iridology.description: Detailed analysis of the iris to assess overall health and identify wellness opportunities.
iridology.fullDescription: Iridology is a natural assessment technique that examines the patterns and colors in the iris to provide insights into your body's condition. This non-invasive analysis helps identify areas of strength and areas needing support in your wellness journey.

orthodynamicGymnastics.title: Orthodynamic Gymnastics
orthodynamicGymnastics.description: Specialized movement and exercise program designed to improve mobility, posture, and functional fitness.
orthodynamicGymnastics.fullDescription: Orthodynamic gymnastics focuses on correcting posture and improving movement patterns through targeted exercises. This specialized program enhances neuro-motor function, increases strength and flexibility, and can be adapted for all fitness levels.

hero.title: Meet Our Team
hero.subtitle: Our dedicated team of certified massage therapists brings years of experience, passion, and expertise to help you achieve optimal wellness and relaxation.

certifiedProfessionals.title: Certified Professionals
certifiedProfessionals.description: All our therapists are licensed and certified in their respective specialties, ensuring you receive the highest quality care.

personalizedCare.title: Personalized Care
personalizedCare.description: We take the time to understand your unique needs and customize each session to address your specific concerns.

continuousLearning.title: Continuous Learning
continuousLearning.description: Our team regularly participates in advanced training and workshops to stay current with the latest techniques and wellness trends.

headmaster.name: Francesca Mayer
headmaster.shortBio: Francesca is the visionary mind behind Relevi Healing, combining extensive experience in holistic disciplines with a passion for authentic wellness.
headmaster.bio: With over 20 years of experience in holistic therapies, Francesca founded Relevi Healing with the vision of creating a space where body, mind, and spirit can find harmony. Her multidisciplinary training and integrated approach have made her a recognized leader in the wellness field. Francesca personally guides the Relevi team, ensuring that every treatment reflects the highest standards of excellence and personalized care.

corradoZamboni.name: Corrado Zamboni
corradoZamboni.bio: Corrado studied and taught economics and is an entrepreneur in the health and nutrition sector. He holds a degree in history and philosophy, with a thesis in aesthetics on the thought of arts in Paul Valery. He is engaged in social economics and political philosophy under the light of ethics and critical thinking. He accompanies personal research with attention and expression of the language of words, body and emotions, through philosophy and the thought of arts, in workshops of thought, dance, writing and drawing. An approach that awakens vitality, emotions and authentic connection with oneself, with others, with the universe. He also offers individual consultation and philosophical cafÃ©s open to the community.

deniseDallaPasqua.name: Denise Dalla Pasqua
deniseDallaPasqua.bio: Denise specializes in sports massage and injury rehabilitation. Her background as a former athlete gives her unique insight into treating muscle tension and enhancing athletic performance.

francescaTonon.name: Francesca Tonon
francescaTonon.bio: Francesca offers comprehensive naturopathic consultations with a unique and personalized approach that goes beyond traditional therapies. Her approach is based on the combination of various natural and holistic disciplines, all aimed at the complete well-being of the personâ€”both physically and emotionally. What makes her consultation unique is precisely the integration of multiple techniques, creating a personalized path for each client.

giancarloPavanello.name: Giancarlo Pavanello
giancarloPavanello.bio: At ReLeVi Healing, Giancarlo offers personalized treatments focused on rebalancing and body listening, with an approach based on sensitivity, presence and technique. His skills include: Detoxifying and Sports Massage, Vodder Method Lymphatic Drainage, Swedish and Anti-stress Massage, Four-handed Biodynamic Massage for a profound mind-body connection experience, Oriental techniques such as Traditional Thai, Ayurvedic Abhyangam, Massages with essential oils, Hot Stone, Lomi Lomi NUI and emotional California massage. Each treatment is adapted to the individual's needs in a welcoming and respectful environment.

graziaSferrazzaCallea.name: Grazia Sferrazza Callea
graziaSferrazzaCallea.bio: I am Grazia Sferrazza Callea. I have studied naturopathy, kinesiology, Traditional Chinese Medicine and Craniosacral Balancing. In 2009 I began studying my own menopause and, thanks to my skills, I made discoveries that allowed me to frame this biological phenomenon in a sense-making way so transformative that I became a Menopause Coach. For about fifteen years I have written a couple of books on the subject and I help women seeking to regain physical and emotional balance.

martinaPasut.name: Martina Pasut
martinaPasut.bio: My passion for yoga stems from a desire to deepen my connection with myselfâ€”mind, body, and emotionsâ€”as well as with people and nature, of which we are all a part. Through fluid movement, conscious breathing, and constant attention to my students, my goal is to offer psychophysical well-being. Even in times when anxiety and stress seem to dominate our lives, we can afford to let go and relax deeply. With me, there are no impossible positions or flexibility competitions: yoga is for everyone!

martinaRoma.name: Martina Roma
martinaRoma.bio: D.O. in Osteopathy, with specializations in pediatric osteopathy and advanced courses in pregnancy, postpartum, temporomandibular disorders, and kinesiological taping. Her continuous education allows her to offer highly personalized treatments. What enchants me most about osteopathy is the ability to take care of the person in their entirety, listen to their story, and feel the path of the symptom in the patient's body. I am passionate about explaining the anatomical and physiological connections between the symptom and its origin to make people aware of their body. I enjoy noticing connections between osteopathy and nature: purity is the element they share. From this reflection, my interest and passion for neonatal/pediatric treatment was born: the child lets themselves be welcomed by my hands, is free from prejudices, and trusts completely. With my knowledge, continuous training, and sensitivity, I strive to ensure the well-being of the person.

massimoGnesotto.name: Massimo Gnesotto
massimoGnesotto.bio: Massimo has embraced and deepened the Biodynamic approach under the guidance of Mike Boxhall, a pioneering English therapist in the field. He proposes a way of working and support based on deep listening to the person, integrating body-mind-spirit and supporting the intrinsic self-regulation capacities innate in each of us. So that Health can once again manifest its potential and guarantee us vitality, harmony, serenity, and fullness.

michelaEssenza.name: Michela
michelaEssenza.bio: Michela in search of the Essence that animates her, passionate about paths and walks in nature where the perception of it stimulates psychophysical well-being, bringing lightness to daily life and from this begins the path of knowledge and deepening through courses in nature. Approaching shiatsu I began to understand what my qualities were, this discipline evaluates and enhances the vital resources of the person bringing benefit. With craniosacral it was a real revelation, a bio-mechanical technique of deep listening to the cerebrospinal fluid, both techniques stimulate the person's well-being. There are two ways of walking, one in doing and the other in Being. Walking with the heart is what characterizes me, our walking the earth creates an imprint for the future and that's what makes the difference from the simple step. Girl on the road ðŸ‘£ðŸ’š

monicaBortoluzzi.name: Monica Bortoluzzi
monicaBortoluzzi.bio: REBIRTHING: Rebirthing is a breathing practice that helps us connect with our inner awareness, discovering and freeing ourselves from limiting beliefs that influence our lives. Through this practice, we can gain deep insights and understanding for our psychophysical well-being. COUNSELING SESSIONS: In a counseling session, we explore together the roots of your psychophysical discomfort, discovering thoughts and emotional reactions that stem from the past. As a counselor, I accompany you on a journey of self-discovery, creating a safe and non-judgmental space where you can connect with your deepest self, to evolve and grow authentically.

paoloAvella.name: Paolo Avella
paoloAvella.bio: His mission is to help people improve mobility, posture, and general well-being through a targeted and progressive approach. Thanks to his training recognized by Sport e Salute and the Ministry of Sport, Paolo guides with professionalism and passion every path, adapting exercises to the needs of each individual.
certifications: Adapts to those with motor difficulties (seated protocol)

sabrinaPozzobon.name: Sabrina Pozzobon
sabrinaPozzobon.bio: I love nature and its colors, but also fashion and textiles, fields I have always worked in thanks to my diploma as a dressmaker. From these passions my current profession was born. I can help you study your personal color analysis, your shapes, your potential and your style in just a few simple steps. The right colors don't just change your appearance, they change the way we perceive ourselves and present ourselves to the world.

tamaraZanchetta.name: Tamara Zanchetta
tamaraZanchetta.bio: Tamara is a yoga instructor and art therapist with a personal and professional journey dedicated to awareness and inner growth. Through art therapy, Tamara guides people on a journey of self-exploration, using artistic expression as a tool to access deep emotions and promote psychophysical well-being. At ReLeVi Healing, Tamara will lead art therapy sessions, offering a safe and welcoming space to express yourself freely and embark on a path of personal transformation.
